title: Is there an eta on IOS release?
content:
Hi

Is there an eta on IOS release? That can be provided. Thank you
creator: hellogoodbye

title: No new email screen opens when I try to use the send to mail recipient on Win11.
content: Thunderbird Version 142.0 will open when I chose a file to send to mail recipient using win 11, but the new email screen doesn't open so no file attaches. All my defaults are correct, there is a proper mail recipient entry in the appdata sendto file and there is a key in the registry for Thunderbird under client mail.
creator: rayshain
